casebody.data:
MOTION DOCKET

97-1117. Simmons-Harris v. Goff.

Franklin App. Nos. 96APE08-982 and 96APE08-991. On motion to file statement of additional authorities of John M. Goff, Superintendent, and state of Ohio, and on motion to file statement of additional authorities of John M. Goff et al. Motions denied.

Baird and Young, JJ., dissent. William R. Baird, J., of the Ninth Appellate District, sitting for Cook, J. William W. Young, J., of the Twelfth Appellate District, sitting for Lundberg Stratton, J.
